item.description: August can be a busy summer month for fitting vacations and family get-togethers around a busy work schedule. The hot weather can also make it hard to find time for exercising your pet. Did you know that in August we celebrate National Best Friend day?! This month let's suprise our faithful four legged Best Friends with lots of FUN and TLC! Special treat for pups if you would like to share why your dog is your Best Friend! Sunday August 21st from 11am-1pm. Proof of Current vaccinations required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Celebrate National Best Friend Day!
